org.libav.avformat

Interface IFormatContextWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IWrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFormatContextWrapper, FormatContextWrapper53, FormatContextWrapper54

    public interface IFormatContextWrapper
extends IWrapper
    Wrapper for the AVFormatContext. It provides access to some of the AVFormatContext properties and also it allows to work with the format context using the Libav functions.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Close the format context.
        Throws:
        LibavException - exception caused by the Libav

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the context has been closed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the context has been closed, false otherwise

      • findStreamInfo

        void findStreamInfo()
                    throws LibavException
        Probe the input stream and find some stream info.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the stream info cannot be get (caused by the Libav)

      • getStreams

        IStreamWrapper[] getStreams()
        Get streams associated with this context. If it is an input context you have to call the findStreamInfo() at first. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the composition of the streams have been changed.
        Returns:
        array of streams associated with this context

      • getStreamCount

        int getStreamCount()
        Get number of streams. If it is an input context you have to call the findStreamInfo() at first. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the composition of the streams have been changed.
        Returns:
        number of streams

      • setStream

        void setStream(int streamIndex,
             IStreamWrapper stream)
        Set stream at the given position.
        Parameters:
        streamIndex - a stream position
        stream - a stream

      • newStream

        IStreamWrapper newStream()
                         throws LibavException
        Create a new stream and clear cached array of streams.
        Returns:
        created stream
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the stream cannot be created (caused by the Libav)

      • getChapters

        IChapterWrapper[] getChapters()
        Get chapters. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the composition of the streams have been changed.
        Returns:
        array of chapters

      • getChapterCount

        int getChapterCount()
        Get number of chapters. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the composition of the streams have been changed.
        Returns:
        number of chapters

      • addChapter

        boolean addChapter(IChapterWrapper chapter)
        Add given chapter and clear cached array of chapters. This method returns false if there is already the same chapter instance or a chapter with the same id, otherwise it returns true.
        Parameters:
        chapter - a chapter
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • removeChapter

        IChapterWrapper removeChapter(int id)
        Remove a chapter with the given chapter ID, return it and clear cached array of chapters.
        Parameters:
        id - a chapter ID
        Returns:
        removed chapter or null if there is no chapter with the given ID

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Get the filename property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        file name

      • setFileName

        void setFileName(String fileName)
        Set the filename property of the AVFormatContext. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        fileName - a file name

      • getIOContext

        IIOContextWrapper getIOContext()
        Get the pb property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        IO context

      • setIOContext

        void setIOContext(IIOContextWrapper ioContext)
        Set the pb property of the AVFormatContext. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        ioContext - an IO context

      • getOutputFormat

        IOutputFormatWrapper getOutputFormat()
        Get the oformat property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        output format

      • setOutputFormat

        void setOutputFormat(IOutputFormatWrapper outputFormat)
        Set the oformat property of the AVFormatContext. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        outputFormat - an output format

        IInputFormatWrapper getInputFormat()
        Get the iformat property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        input format

        long getDuration()
        Get file/stream duration. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        file/stream duration

      • getPrivateData

        Pointer<?> getPrivateData()
        Get the priv_data property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        format context private data

      • getRealStartTime

        Date getRealStartTime()
        Get the start_time_realtime property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        format context metadata

      • setRealStartTime

        void setRealStartTime(Date realStartTime)
        Set the start_time_realtime property of the AVFormatContext. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        realStartTime - a real start time

      • getMetadata

        IDictionaryWrapper getMetadata()
        Get the metadata property from the AVFormatContext. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        format context metadata

        boolean readNextPacket(IPacketWrapper packet)
        Read next packet from the container.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true on success, false on EOF or read error

                 throws LibavException

      • interleavedWritePacket

        void interleavedWritePacket(IPacketWrapper packet)
                            throws LibavException
        Write the given packet into the container (this method keeps all written packets in interleaved order).
        Parameters:
        packet - a packet
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the packet cannot be written (caused by the Libav)

      • seekFile

        void seekFile(long minTime,
            long time,
            long maxTime)
              throws LibavException
        Seek the file/stream to the given absolute time (in miliseconds from the begining)
        Parameters:
        minTime - a minimal tolerable position
        time - a time to seek at
        maxTime - a miximal tolerable position
        Throws:
        LibavException - if seeking fails for some reason
